description: This file defines a React Native component 'NotesList' that displays a list of notes, supports searching, deletion, and pull-to-refresh functionality. It interfaces with a local database for fetching and deleting notes, and uses navigation to move to note editing screens.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously initializes the database and loads notes from it, updating the component state.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID and reloads the list.
